data.name: Mahou Mating Demo
data.detailed_description:
An average man wanders the streets one night to suddenly find two magical girls fighting. He gets hit by a stray spell, and finds himself granted strange magic powers.

However, the magical girls want this new magic for themselves. They abuse him, and selfishly drag him into their quarrel for power.

The unfortunate man harbors a burning hatred for the greedy pair. His magic powers grow, and before long, he enacts his vengeance with erotic mind control spells...

These magical girls will taste justice via brainwashed sex!

Features:

  • 4 unique endings
  • 20+ CG
  • Full English Voice Acting
  • An Original Soundtrack
  • 1080p HD Resolution

data.short_description: Punish the naughty magical girls by turning them into your brainwashed sex toys in this fully-voiced erotic visual novel!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 or DirectX 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: MacOS 10.10+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes:
This game features non-consensual sex, mind control, impregnation, tentacles, and more. Player discretion is advised.

All characters involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.
